document.full_text: one day after his live show bombed in detroit, actor charlie sheen staged a comeback in chicago, changing the performance's format and winning some fans in the process, according to media reports on monday.
document.title: charlie sheen stages a comeback in chicago
lines_and_colors: one day after his live show bombed in detroit, actor charlie sheen staged a comeback in chicago, changing the performance's format and winning some fans in the process, according to media reports on monday.
